title: Yemight
author: Yemight
content: Welcome to Professional Telegram Airdrop Bot Development service.Default airdrop bot steps (customizable):Bot sends all airdrop informationAirdrop all tasklistThen the user presses the "Join Airdrop" button.Bot asks:User Must Join Telegram Channel & GroupBot sends all airdrop tasklistBot ask submit your usernameBEP-20 crypto wallet address or other wallet addressBot ask did you completed all social media taskGet referral links to invite users and get more rewards.Extra Features:Youtube channel link addFacebook, Twitter, other social media links addBonus buttonPresale massageWithdraw button add & etc.Admin power:Ways to identify fake usersSee Real-Time Bot User StatisticsSend message to all airdrop membersUser balance customizationPause/unpause the airdrop botGet excel file for all userGet bulksender file.Youtube: https://youtu.be/rtvvNm_YFjM
